backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing bookings, user profiles, service rates, time slots, and image path management with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new format by resetting image path structures to the new blob-based schema.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend image-handling features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, theming variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app with metadata, fonts, and the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Admin table displaying sorted bookings with CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagesEdit: Admin tool for uploading and saving hero, service card, and gallery images with API hooks and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServiceRat: Form for editing and saving service rates using API hooks with basic validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/TimeSlotsE: Interface to toggle booking time‑slot availability and save updates through API hooks.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Booking form handling validation, time‑slot availability, submission, and optional prefilled service.
frontend/src/components/booking/bookingV: Validates booking form fields including name, phone, date, service, and area with specific rules.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Float: Floating WhatsApp CTA button linking to a normalized phone number.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile sticky CTA bar with a button to trigger booking.
frontend/src/components/estimate/Estimat: Live cost estimator computing service pricing based on area and selected service, with inspection handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing brand info, contact details, service list, and a powered‑by link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with navigation to account and a call button using config phone number.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Displays contact details including phone, email, and service areas in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Shows a before/after image gallery using provided images or fallback defaults.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Renders the hero banner with background image, headline, and buttons for booking or calling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Presents a three-step process with icons explaining how the service works.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Review: Displays customer reviews with star ratings inside card components.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper with optional reveal-on-scroll animation and style variants.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Renders service cards with images, details, and booking actions, supporting custom image overrides.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Lists key reasons to choose the service with icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/config/ceilingPro.ts: Exports static contact configuration including phone, WhatsApp, and email.
frontend/src/domain/services.ts: Defines service metadata, default rates, and a helper to get pricing based on rate keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor with identity handling and automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all bookings, user bookings, and create a new booking via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePaths.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update image paths from the backend, converting stored images to direct URLs and supplying defaults when no actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Implements single and multiple image upload mutations that convert files to ExternalBlobs and upload them to backend storage with progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider for handling authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to determine if the current caller is an admin, with errors defaulting to false.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Exposes a hook using IntersectionObserver to reveal elements when they enter the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRates.ts: Fetches and updates service rate data from the backend, returning defaults when no actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeSlotAvailabili: Retrieves and updates booking time slot availability from the backend, with fallback defaults when no actor exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller’s user profile, handling actor‑dependent loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus global layout and typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the account page with login flow, profile setup, profile saving, and a user’s bookings display.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard with editors for images, service rates, time slots, and a bookings table.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with multiple marketing sections and scrolls to the booking section when a service is preselected.
frontend/src/state/bookingPrefill.ts: Defines a Zustand store for storing and clearing a preselected booking service.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, requirements, architecture notes, and implemented features for the Ceiling Pro website.
